name: Ghost Of Fall DEMO
description:
Ghost Of Fall is a 2d adventure game with heavy emphasis on atmosphere and story.

The game takes place in the mysterious city of Taro - abandoned hundreds of years ago for reasons unclear and deemed inhabitable by the authorities only a few years ago. Ward, who you will follow during the game, bored of his everyday life, moved to the city as soon as he could to hopefully sate his wanderlust, but his new life in Taro proved to be annoyingly uneventful.

Things are about to change however, as when his sister mysteriously dissapears, he needs to take care of his nephew - Alek, who seems to keep as many mysteries as the city itself. At the same time - the elusive leader of the Feleks - Forrox visits the city and is sharing a common interest in its past with Ward, whom he hires as a local guide. To add to this, at the same time the young felek starts having rather unusual visions, which feel much more real than a daydream... Guiding him on his adventure the player will need to solve mysteries intertwined into the world of Taro, meet and talk to it's inhabitants, as well as, when given no other choice, prove his strenght and reflexes in battles - big and small. The city however, does not offer just a challenge. It is a charming place full of interesting things, with beautiful views, remote and diverse locations - perfect places for relaxation and reflection. All this accompanied by a soundtrack composed and performed by Felocai.

This demonstrative version of "Ghost of Fall" lets you get acquainted with some gameplay mechanics that the game has to offer, as well as get to know the main character - Ward. The demo can also be described as a "Chapter zero" of the main story, as it takes place just before the main game begins.

We encourage you to join our official discord server if you are interested in the game!

Everybody is free to join. It is a place where we will be sharing updates on the developement and we will be avaible to answer any questions you might have directly. Additionally, if you decide to back our project - you will get a backer role on the server, which will grant to access to a channel with more frequent and more in depth developement updates. We hope to see you there!
